meaningMnemonic: Using <radical>flowers</radical> to make a <radical>lip ring</radical> is always going to end in <kanji>frustration</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: After some <kanji>frustration</kanji>, you made your flower lip ring. Now you look like an <reading>Egy</reading>ptian  (いじ) pharaoh. Because all ancient Egyptian monarchs wore flower lip rings (historical fact)!
